value.title: All Selected DAX Expression in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to one another episode of Wednesday with DAX. During this session, we will talk about the most important DAX expression ALLSELECTED(). Most of the time we have confusion between when to use ALL and when to use ALLSELECTED DAX function. First, we have taken one real life example and scenario here.

value.title: DAX Functions Overview - Date and Time Function in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to my new series ‚Äì ‚ÄúWednesday with DAX‚Äù. This is the first video of this series. The first episode covers all Date and Time functions used in Power BI In this video, we will talk about Date and Time functions in Power BI. value.title: How to Use Variable in DAX Formula with Power BI Measures and Calculated Columns?

Then we will talk about the syntax to use variable inside DAX. The session covers the following points: ‚Ä¢ Introduction to Variable

value.title: DAX Measures: Filter Context Explained in Simple Terms using the I.C.A.N. Principle
value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the ‚ÄúFilter Context‚Äù using the 4-easy step approach of the I.C.A.N. Principle. ==  I. Incoming Filters ==  C. CALCULATE does it‚Äôs Magic! ==  A. Apply relationships (filters flow Across relationships)
